com.ctrlaltelite.pos.database

Class ComboDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ctrlaltelite.pos.database.ComboDAO

  • public class ComboDAO
extends Object
    Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing Combo entities in the database. Provides methods to perform CRUD operations on the combos table.

      • getComboById

        public static Combo getComboById(int comboId)
                          throws SQLException
        Retrieves a Combo from the database based on its unique identifier.
        Parameters:
        comboId - the unique identifier of the Combo to retrieve
        Returns:
        the Combo object if found and active; otherwise, null
        Throws:
        SQLException - if a database access error occurs

        Parameters:
